Overview
Are you tired of mistyping your password and getting locked out of your accounts? The Password to Text Converter extension is here to help! This extension is designed especially for older adults and anyone who finds it challenging to enter passwords accurately.

Description
Passwords are typically hidden behind asterisks (***) to ensure privacy. However, this can sometimes make it difficult to spot typing errors, leading to frustration and account lockouts. Our extension transforms password input fields into plain text, allowing you to see exactly what you're typing. This simple yet powerful tool can save you time and prevent unnecessary account lockouts.

Features
Toggle Password Visibility: Easily switch between hidden and visible password input fields with a single click.
User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive and easy to use, designed with simplicity in mind.
Quick Activation: Instantly see your password as you type, reducing the chances of errors.
Privacy First: The extension only changes the visibility of passwords locally on your device, ensuring your data remains secure.
How to Use
Install the Password to Text Converter extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Navigate to a login page with a password field.
Click the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar.
Toggle the switch to reveal your password as you type.
Ideal For
Older adults who need an easier way to enter passwords.
Anyone who frequently mistypes passwords and wants to reduce frustration.
Users looking to save time and avoid account lockouts.
Privacy and Security
Your privacy is our top priority. The Password to Text Converter extension works entirely within your browser and does not collect or transmit any of your data. Your passwords are visible only to you on your device.
